body.p: The clock is ticking - modular X is being made available this week, reports the Gentoo Weekly Newsletter. The arch tester team for the x86 architecture is recruiting members, and the AMD64 developers have a new dual-core X2 machine at their fingertips. Community news, tips & tricks, press clippings and a report from last weekend's open-source conference in Tokyo complete this week's edition of the GWN, along with the usual security announcements and bug report statistics. Enjoy reading!
